2138
2139target_handler::trajectory target_ui::run()
2140{
2141 if( mode == TargetMode::Spell && !no_mana && !casting->can_cast( *you ) ) {
2142 you->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You don't have enough %s to cast this spell" ),
2143 casting->energy_string() );
2144 }
2145 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire || mode == TargetMode::TurretManual || mode == TargetMode::Shape ) {
2146 ensure_ranged_gun_mode();
2147 update_ammo_range_from_gun_mode();
2148 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
2149 sight_dispersion = you->effective_dispersion( relevant->sight_dispersion() );
2150 }
2151 }
2152
2153 map &here = get_map();
2154 // Load settings
2155 allow_zlevel_shift = here.has_zlevels() && get_option<bool>( "FOV_3D" );
2156 snap_to_target = get_option<bool>( "SNAP_TO_TARGET" );
2157 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets ) {
2158 // Due to how cluttered the display would become, disable it by default
2159 // unless aiming a single turret.
2160 draw_turret_lines = vturrets->size() == 1;
2161 }
2162
2163 avatar &player_character = *you;
2164 on_out_of_scope cleanup( [&here, &player_character]() {
2165 here.invalidate_map_cache( player_character.pos().z + player_character.view_offset.z );
2166 } );
2167 restore_on_out_of_scope<tripoint> view_offset_prev( player_character.view_offset );
2168
2169 shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> target_ui_cb = make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>(
2170 [&]() {
2171 draw_terrain_overlay();
2172 } );
2173 g->add_draw_callback( target_ui_cb );
2174
2175 ui_adaptor ui;
2176 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2177 init_window_and_input();
2178 ui.position_from_window( w_target );
2179 } );
2180 ui.mark_resize();
2181
2182 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2183 draw_ui_window();
2184 } );
2185
2186 // Handle multi-turn aiming
2187 std::string action;
2188 bool attack_was_confirmed = false;
2189 bool reentered = false;
2190 bool resume_critter = false;
2191 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire && !activity->first_turn ) {
2192 // We were in this UI during previous turn...
2193 reentered = true;
2194 std::string act_data = activity->action;
2195 if( act_data == "AIM" ) {
2196 // ...and ran out of moves while aiming.
2197 } else {
2198 // ...and selected 'aim and shoot', but ran out of moves.
2199 // So, skip retrieving input and go straight to the action.
2200 action = act_data;
2201 attack_was_confirmed = true;
2202 }
2203 // Load state to keep the ui consistent across turns
2204 snap_to_target = activity->snap_to_target;
2205 shifting_view = activity->shifting_view;
2206 resume_critter = activity->aiming_at_critter;
2207 }
2208
2209 // Initialize cursor position
2210 src = you->pos();
2211 update_target_list();
2212
2213 tripoint initial_dst = src;
2214 if( reentered ) {
2215 if( !try_reacquire_target( resume_critter, initial_dst ) ) {
2216 // Target lost
2217 action.clear();
2218 attack_was_confirmed = false;
2219 }
2220 } else {
2221 initial_dst = choose_initial_target();
2222 }
2223 set_cursor_pos( initial_dst );
2224 if( dst != initial_dst ) {
2225 // Our target moved out of range
2226 action.clear();
2227 attack_was_confirmed = false;
2228 }
2229 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
2230 if( activity->aif_duration > AIF_DURATION_LIMIT ) {
2231 // Break long (potentially infinite) aim-and-fire loop.
2232 // May happen if e.g. avatar tries to get 'precise' shot while being
2233 // attacked by multiple zombies, which triggers dodges and corresponding aim loss.
2234 action.clear();
2235 attack_was_confirmed = false;
2236 }
2237 if( !activity->first_turn && !action.empty() && !prompt_friendlies_in_lof() ) {
2238 // A friendly creature moved into line of fire during aim-and-shoot,
2239 // and player decided to stop aiming
2240 action.clear();
2241 attack_was_confirmed = false;
2242 }
2243 activity->acceptable_losses.clear();
2244 if( action.empty() ) {
2245 activity->aif_duration = 0;
2246 } else {
2247 activity->aif_duration += 1;
2248 }
2249 }
2250
2251 // Event loop!
2252 ExitCode loop_exit_code;
2253 std::string timed_out_action;
2254 bool skip_redraw = false;
2255 for( ;; action.clear() ) {
2256 if( !skip_redraw ) {
2257 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
2258 ui_manager::redraw();
2259 }
2260 skip_redraw = false;
2261
2262 // Wait for user input (or use value retrieved from activity)
2263 if( action.empty() ) {
2264 int timeout = get_option<int>( "EDGE_SCROLL" );
2265 action = ctxt.handle_input( timeout );
2266 }
2267
2268 // If an aiming mode is selected, use "*_SHOT" instead of "FIRE"
2269 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire && action == "FIRE" && aim_mode->has_threshold ) {
2270 action = aim_mode->action;
2271 }
2272
2273 // Handle received input
2274 if( handle_cursor_movement( action, skip_redraw ) ) {
2275 continue;
2276 } else if( action == "TOGGLE_SNAP_TO_TARGET" ) {
2277 toggle_snap_to_target();
2278 } else if( action == "TOGGLE_TURRET_LINES" ) {
2279 draw_turret_lines = !draw_turret_lines;
2280 } else if( action == "TOGGLE_MOVE_CURSOR_VIEW" ) {
2281 if( snap_to_target ) {
2282 toggle_snap_to_target();
2283 }
2284 shifting_view = !shifting_view;
2285 } else if( action == "zoom_in" ) {
2286 g->zoom_in();
2287 g->mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
2288 } else if( action == "zoom_out" ) {
2289 g->zoom_out();
2290 g->mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
2291 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
2292 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Abort;
2293 break;
2294 } else if( action == "SWITCH_MODE" ) {
2295 action_switch_mode();
2296 } else if( action == "SWITCH_AMMO" ) {
2297 if( !action_switch_ammo() ) {
2298 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Reload;
2299 break;
2300 }
2301 } else if( action == "FIRE" ) {
2302 if( status != Status::Good ) {
2303 continue;
2304 }
2305 bool can_skip_confirm = ( mode == TargetMode::Spell && casting->damage() <= 0 );
2306 if( !can_skip_confirm && !confirm_non_enemy_target() ) {
2307 continue;
2308 }
2309 set_last_target();
2310 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Fire;
2311 break;
2312 } else if( action == "AIM" ) {
2313 if( status != Status::Good ) {
2314 continue;
2315 }
2316
2317 // No confirm_non_enemy_target here because we have not initiated the firing.
2318 // Aiming can be stopped / aborted at any time.
2319
2320 if( !action_aim() ) {
2321 timed_out_action = "AIM";
2322 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Timeout;
2323 break;
2324 }
2325 } else if( action == "AIMED_SHOT" || action == "CAREFUL_SHOT" || action == "PRECISE_SHOT" ) {
2326 if( status != Status::Good ) {
2327 continue;
2328 }
2329
2330 // This action basically means "Fire" as well; the actual firing may be delayed
2331 // through aiming, but there is usually no means to abort it. Therefore we query now
2332 if( !attack_was_confirmed && !confirm_non_enemy_target() ) {
2333 continue;
2334 }
2335
2336 if( action_aim_and_shoot( action ) ) {
2337 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Fire;
2338 } else {
2339 timed_out_action = action;
2340 loop_exit_code = ExitCode::Timeout;
2341 }
2342 break;
2343 }
2344 } // for(;;)
2345
2346 switch( loop_exit_code ) {
2347 case ExitCode::Abort: {
2348 traj.clear();
2349 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire || mode == TargetMode::Shape ) {
2350 activity->aborted = true;
2351 }
2352 break;
2353 }
2354 case ExitCode::Fire: {
2355 bool harmful = !( mode == TargetMode::Spell && casting->damage() <= 0 );
2356 on_target_accepted( harmful );
2357 break;
2358 }
2359 case ExitCode::Timeout: {
2360 // We've ran out of moves, save UI state
2361 activity->acceptable_losses = list_friendlies_in_lof();
2362 traj.clear();
2363 activity->action = timed_out_action;
2364 activity->snap_to_target = snap_to_target;
2365 activity->shifting_view = shifting_view;
2366 activity->aiming_at_critter = !!dst_critter;
2367 break;
2368 }
2369 case ExitCode::Reload: {
2370 traj.clear();
2371 activity->aborted = true;
2372 activity->reload_requested = true;
2373 break;
2374 }
2375 }
2376
2377 return traj;
2378}
2379
2380void target_ui::init_window_and_input()
2381{
2382 std::string display_type = get_option<std::string>( "ACCURACY_DISPLAY" );
2383 std::string panel_type = panel_manager::get_manager().get_current_layout_id();
2384 narrow = ( panel_type == "compact" || panel_type == "labels-narrow" );
2385
2386 int top = 0;
2387 int width;
2388 int height;
2389 if( narrow ) {
2390 // Narrow layout removes the list of controls. This allows us
2391 // to have small window size and not suffer from it.
2392 width = 34;
2393 height = 24;
2394 compact = true;
2395 } else {
2396 width = 55;
2397 compact = TERMY < 41;
2398 tiny = TERMY < 28;
2399 bool use_whole_sidebar = TERMY < 32;
2400 if( use_whole_sidebar ) {
2401 // If we're extremely short on space, use the whole sidebar.
2402 height = TERMY;
2403 } else if( compact ) {
2404 // Cover up more low-value ui elements if we're tight on space.
2405 height = 28;
2406 } else {
2407 // Go all out
2408 height = 32;
2409 }
2410 }
2411
2412 w_target = catacurses::newwin( height, width, point( TERMX - width, top ) );
2413
2414 ctxt = input_context( "TARGET" );
2415 ctxt.set_iso( true );
2416 ctxt.register_directions();
2417 ctxt.register_action( "COORDINATE" );
2418 ctxt.register_action( "SELECT" );
2419 ctxt.register_action( "FIRE" );
2420 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TARGET" );
2421 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TARGET" );
2422 ctxt.register_action( "CENTER" );
2423 ctxt.register_action( "TOGGLE_SNAP_TO_TARGET" );
2424 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2425 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
2426 ctxt.register_action( "MOUSE_MOVE" );
2427 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_out" );
2428 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_in" );
2429 ctxt.register_action( "TOGGLE_MOVE_CURSOR_VIEW" );
2430 if( allow_zlevel_shift ) {
2431 ctxt.register_action( "LEVEL_UP" );
2432 ctxt.register_action( "LEVEL_DOWN" );
2433 }
2434 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire || mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
2435 ctxt.register_action( "SWITCH_MODE" );
2436 if( mode == TargetMode::TurretManual || relevant->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
2437 // Turrets may support multiple ammo types.
2438 // RELOAD_AND_SHOOT weapons use whatever ammo is favorite.
2439 ctxt.register_action( "SWITCH_AMMO" );
2440 }
2441 }
2442 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
2443 ctxt.register_action( "AIM" );
2444
2445 aim_types = you->get_aim_types( *relevant );
2446 for( aim_type &type : aim_types ) {
2447 if( type.has_threshold ) {
2448 ctxt.register_action( type.action );
2449 }
2450 }
2451 aim_mode = aim_types.begin();
2452 for( auto it = aim_types.begin(); it != aim_types.end(); ++it ) {
2453 if( you->preferred_aiming_mode == it->action ) {
2454 aim_mode = it; // default to persisted mode if possible
2455 }
2456 }
2457 }
2458 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets ) {
2459 ctxt.register_action( "TOGGLE_TURRET_LINES" );
2460 }
2461}
2462
2463bool target_ui::handle_cursor_movement( const std::string &action, bool &skip_redraw )
2464{
2465 cata::optional<tripoint> mouse_pos;
2466 const auto shift_view_or_cursor = [this]( const tripoint & delta ) {
2467 if( this->shifting_view ) {
2468 this->set_view_offset( this->you->view_offset + delta );
2469 } else {
2470 this->set_cursor_pos( dst + delta );
2471 }
2472 };
2473
2474 if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" || action == "TIMEOUT" ) {
2475 // Shift pos and/or view via edge scrolling
2476 tripoint edge_scroll = g->mouse_edge_scrolling_terrain( ctxt );
2477 if( edge_scroll == tripoint_zero ) {
2478 skip_redraw = true;
2479 } else {
2480 if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
2481 edge_scroll *= 2;
2482 }
2483 if( snap_to_target ) {
2484 set_cursor_pos( dst + edge_scroll );
2485 } else {
2486 set_view_offset( you->view_offset + edge_scroll );
2487 }
2488 }
2489 } else if( const cata::optional<tripoint> delta = ctxt.get_direction( action ) ) {
2490 // Shift view/cursor with directional keys
2491 shift_view_or_cursor( *delta );
2492 } else if( action == "SELECT" && ( mouse_pos = ctxt.get_coordinates( g->w_terrain ) ) ) {
2493 // Set pos by clicking with mouse
2494 mouse_pos->z = you->pos().z + you->view_offset.z;
2495 set_cursor_pos( *mouse_pos );
2496 } else if( action == "LEVEL_UP" || action == "LEVEL_DOWN" ) {
2497 // Shift view/cursor up/down one z level
2498 tripoint delta = tripoint(
2499 0,
2500 0,
2501 action == "LEVEL_UP" ? 1 : -1
2502 );
2503 shift_view_or_cursor( delta );
2504 } else if( action == "NEXT_TARGET" ) {
2505 cycle_targets( 1 );
2506 } else if( action == "PREV_TARGET" ) {
2507 cycle_targets( -1 );
2508 } else if( action == "CENTER" ) {
2509 if( shifting_view ) {
2510 set_view_offset( tripoint_zero );
2511 } else {
2512 set_cursor_pos( src );
2513 }
2514 } else {
2515 return false;
2516 }
2517
2518 return true;
2519}
2520
2521bool target_ui::set_cursor_pos( const tripoint &new_pos )
2522{
2523 if( dst == new_pos ) {
2524 return false;
2525 }
2526 if( status == Status::OutOfAmmo && new_pos != src ) {
2527 // range == 0, no sense in moving cursor
2528 return false;
2529 }
2530
2531 // Make sure new position is valid or find a closest valid position
2532 std::vector<tripoint> new_traj;
2533 tripoint valid_pos = new_pos;
2534 map &here = get_map();
2535 if( new_pos != src ) {
2536 // On Z axis, make sure we do not exceed map boundaries
2537 valid_pos.z = clamp( valid_pos.z, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT );
2538 // Or current view range
2539 valid_pos.z = clamp( valid_pos.z - src.z, -fov_3d_z_range, fov_3d_z_range ) + src.z;
2540
2541 new_traj = here.find_clear_path( src, valid_pos );
2542 if( range == 1 ) {
2543 // We should always be able to hit adjacent squares
2544 if( square_dist( src, valid_pos ) > 1 ) {
2545 valid_pos = new_traj[0];
2546 }
2547 } else if( trigdist ) {
2548 if( dist_fn( valid_pos ) > range ) {
2549 // Find the farthest point that is still in range
2550 for( size_t i = new_traj.size(); i > 0; i-- ) {
2551 if( dist_fn( new_traj[i - 1] ) <= range ) {
2552 valid_pos = new_traj[i - 1];
2553 break;
2554 }
2555 }
2556 // Sanity check
2557 if( dist_fn( valid_pos ) > range ) {
2558 debugmsg( "Calculated trajectory exceeds allowed range!" );
2559 valid_pos = src;
2560 }
2561 }
2562 } else {
2563 tripoint delta = valid_pos - src;
2564 valid_pos = src + tripoint(
2565 clamp( delta.x, -range, range ),
2566 clamp( delta.y, -range, range ),
2567 clamp( delta.z, -range, range )
2568 );
2569 }
2570 } else {
2571 new_traj.push_back( src );
2572 }
2573
2574 if( valid_pos == dst ) {
2575 // We don't need to move the cursor after all
2576 return false;
2577 } else if( new_pos == valid_pos ) {
2578 // We can reuse new_traj
2579 dst = valid_pos;
2580 traj = new_traj;
2581 } else {
2582 dst = valid_pos;
2583 traj = here.find_clear_path( src, dst );
2584 }
2585
2586 if( snap_to_target ) {
2587 set_view_offset( dst - src );
2588 }
2589
2590 // Make player's sprite flip to face the current target
2591 point d( dst.xy() - src.xy() );
2592 if( !tile_iso ) {
2593
2594 if( d.x > 0 ) {
2595 you->facing = FacingDirection::FD_RIGHT;
2596 } else if( d.x < 0 ) {
2597 you->facing = FacingDirection::FD_LEFT;
2598 }
2599 } else {
2600 if( d.x >= 0 && d.y >= 0 ) {
2601 you->facing = FacingDirection::FD_RIGHT;
2602 }
2603 if( d.y <= 0 && d.x <= 0 ) {
2604 you->facing = FacingDirection::FD_LEFT;
2605 }
2606 }
2607
2608 // Cache creature under cursor
2609 if( src != dst ) {
2610 Creature *cr = g->critter_at( dst, true );
2611 if( cr && pl_sees( *cr ) ) {
2612 dst_critter = cr;
2613 } else {
2614 dst_critter = nullptr;
2615 }
2616 } else {
2617 dst_critter = nullptr;
2618 }
2619
2620 // Update mode-specific stuff
2621 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
2622 recalc_aim_turning_penalty();
2623 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Spell ) {
2624 const std::string fx = casting->effect();
2625 if( fx == "target_attack" || fx == "projectile_attack" || fx == "ter_transform" ) {
2626 spell_aoe = spell_effect::spell_effect_blast( *casting, src, dst, casting->aoe(), true );
2627 } else if( fx == "cone_attack" ) {
2628 spell_aoe = spell_effect::spell_effect_cone( *casting, src, dst, casting->aoe(), true );
2629 } else if( fx == "line_attack" ) {
2630 spell_aoe = spell_effect::spell_effect_line( *casting, src, dst, casting->aoe(), true );
2631 } else {
2632 spell_aoe.clear();
2633 }
2634 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets ) {
2635 update_turrets_in_range();
2636 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Shape ) {
2637 std::shared_ptr<shape> sh = shape_gen->create( src, dst );
2638 projectile proj = make_gun_projectile( *relevant );
2639 // Same as in map::shoot (should probably be a function!)
2640 int expected_bash_force = std::accumulate( proj.impact.begin(), proj.impact.end(), 0.0,
2641 []( double acc, const damage_unit & du ) {
2642 return acc + du.amount + du.res_pen;
2643 } );
2644 shape_coverage = ranged::expected_coverage( *sh, here, expected_bash_force );
2645 }
2646
2647 // Update UI controls & colors
2648 update_status();
2649
2650 return true;
2651}
2652
2653void target_ui::on_range_ammo_changed()
2654{
2655 update_status();
2656 update_target_list();
2657}
2658
2659void target_ui::update_target_list()
2660{
2661 if( range == 0 ) {
2662 targets.clear();
2663 return;
2664 }
2665
2666 // Get targets in range and sort them by distance (targets[0] is the closest)
2667
2668 if( mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
2669 targets = ranged::targetable_creatures( *you, range, *turret );
2670 } else {
2671 targets = ranged::targetable_creatures( *you, range );
2672 }
2673
2674 std::sort( targets.begin(), targets.end(), [&]( const Creature * lhs, const Creature * rhs ) {
2675 return rl_dist_exact( lhs->pos(), you->pos() ) < rl_dist_exact( rhs->pos(), you->pos() );
2676 } );
2677}
2678
2679tripoint target_ui::choose_initial_target()
2680{
2681 // Try previously targeted creature
2682 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> cr = you->last_target.lock();
2683 if( cr && pl_sees( *cr ) && dist_fn( cr->pos() ) <= range ) {
2684 return cr->pos();
2685 }
2686
2687 // Try closest creature
2688 if( !targets.empty() ) {
2689 return targets[0]->pos();
2690 }
2691
2692 // Try closest practice target
2693 map &here = get_map();
2694 const std::vector<tripoint> nearby = closest_points_first( src, range );
2695 const auto target_spot = std::find_if( nearby.begin(), nearby.end(),
2696 [this, &here]( const tripoint & pt ) {
2697 return here.tr_at( pt ).id == tr_practice_target && this->you->sees( pt );
2698 } );
2699 if( target_spot != nearby.end() ) {
2700 return *target_spot;
2701 }
2702
2703 // We've got nothing.
2704 return src;
2705}
2706
2707bool target_ui::try_reacquire_target( bool critter, tripoint &new_dst )
2708{
2709 if( critter ) {
2710 // Try to re-acquire the creature
2711 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> cr = you->last_target.lock();
2712 if( cr && pl_sees( *cr ) && dist_fn( cr->pos() ) <= range ) {
2713 new_dst = cr->pos();
2714 return true;
2715 }
2716 }
2717
2718 if( !you->last_target_pos.has_value() ) {
2719 // This shouldn't happen
2720 return false;
2721 }
2722
2723 // Try to re-acquire target tile or tile where the target creature used to be
2724 tripoint local_lt = get_map().getlocal( *you->last_target_pos );
2725 if( dist_fn( local_lt ) <= range ) {
2726 new_dst = local_lt;
2727 // Abort aiming if a creature moved in
2728 return !critter && !g->critter_at( local_lt, true );
2729 }
2730
2731 // We moved out of range
2732 return false;
2733}
2734
2735void target_ui::update_status()
2736{
2737 std::vector<std::string> msgbuf;
2738 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets && turrets_in_range.empty() ) {
2739 // None of the turrets are in range
2740 status = Status::OutOfRange;
2741 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Fire &&
2742 ( !ranged::gunmode_checks_common( *you, get_map(), msgbuf, relevant->gun_current_mode() ) ||
2743 !ranged::gunmode_checks_weapon( *you, get_map(), msgbuf, relevant->gun_current_mode() ) ) ) {
2744 // Selected gun mode is empty
2745 // TODO: it might be some other error, but that's highly unlikely to happen, so a catch-all 'Out of ammo' is fine
2746 status = Status::OutOfAmmo;
2747 } else if( mode == TargetMode::TurretManual && ( turret->query() != turret_data::status::ready ||
2748 !ranged::gunmode_checks_common( *you, get_map(), msgbuf, relevant->gun_current_mode() ) ) ) {
2749 status = Status::OutOfAmmo;
2750 } else if( ( src == dst ) && !( mode == TargetMode::Spell &&
2751 casting->is_valid_target( valid_target::target_self ) ) ) {
2752 // TODO: consider allowing targeting yourself with turrets
2753 status = Status::BadTarget;
2754 } else if( dist_fn( dst ) > range ) {
2755 // We're out of range. This can happen if we switch from long-ranged
2756 // gun mode to short-ranged. We can, of course, move the cursor into range automatically,
2757 // but that would be rude. Instead, wait for directional keys/etc. and *then* move the cursor.
2758 status = Status::OutOfRange;
2759 } else {
2760 status = Status::Good;
2761 }
2762}
2763
2764int target_ui::dist_fn( const tripoint &p )
2765{
2766 return static_cast<int>( std::round( rl_dist_exact( src, p ) ) );
2767}
2768
2769void target_ui::set_last_target()
2770{
2771 you->last_target_pos = get_map().getabs( dst );
2772 if( dst_critter ) {
2773 you->last_target = g->shared_from( *dst_critter );
2774 } else {
2775 you->last_target.reset();
2776 }
2777}
2778
2779bool target_ui::confirm_non_enemy_target()
2780{
2781 npc *const who = dynamic_cast<npc *>( dst_critter );
2782 if( who && !who->guaranteed_hostile() ) {
2783 return query_yn( _( "Really attack %s?" ), who->name.c_str() );
2784 }
2785 return true;
2786}
2787
2788bool target_ui::prompt_friendlies_in_lof()
2789{
2790 if( mode != TargetMode::Fire ) {
2791 debugmsg( "Not implemented" );
2792 return true;
2793 }
2794
2795 std::vector<weak_ptr_fast<Creature>> in_lof = list_friendlies_in_lof();
2796 std::vector<Creature *> new_in_lof;
2797 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &cr_ptr : in_lof ) {
2798 bool found = false;
2799 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> ptr_lock = cr_ptr.lock();
2800 Creature *cr = ptr_lock.get();
2801 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &cr2_ptr : activity->acceptable_losses ) {
2802 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> ptr2_lock = cr2_ptr.lock();
2803 Creature *cr2 = ptr2_lock.get();
2804 if( cr == cr2 ) {
2805 found = true;
2806 break;
2807 }
2808 }
2809 if( !found ) {
2810 new_in_lof.push_back( cr );
2811 }
2812 }
2813
2814 if( new_in_lof.empty() ) {
2815 return true;
2816 }
2817
2818 std::string msg = _( "There are friendly creatures in line of fire:\n" );
2819 for( Creature *cr : new_in_lof ) {
2820 msg += " " + cr->disp_name() + "\n";
2821 }
2822 msg += _( "Proceed with the attack?" );
2823 return query_yn( msg );
2824}
2825
2826std::vector<weak_ptr_fast<Creature>> target_ui::list_friendlies_in_lof()
2827{
2828 std::vector<weak_ptr_fast<Creature>> ret;
2829 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets || mode == TargetMode::Spell ) {
2830 debugmsg( "Not implemented" );
2831 return ret;
2832 }
2833 for( const tripoint &p : traj ) {
2834 if( p != dst && p != src ) {
2835 Creature *cr = g->critter_at( p, true );
2836 if( cr && you->sees( *cr ) ) {
2837 Creature::Attitude a = cr->attitude_to( *this->you );
2838 if(
2839 ( cr->is_npc() && a != Creature::A_HOSTILE ) ||
2840 ( !cr->is_npc() && a == Creature::A_FRIENDLY )
2841 ) {
2842 ret.push_back( g->shared_from( *cr ) );
2843 }
2844 }
2845 }
2846 }
2847 return ret;
2848}
2849
2850void target_ui::toggle_snap_to_target()
2851{
2852 shifting_view = false;
2853 if( snap_to_target ) {
2854 // Keep current view offset
2855 } else {
2856 set_view_offset( dst - src );
2857 }
2858 snap_to_target = !snap_to_target;
2859}
2860
2861void target_ui::cycle_targets( int direction )
2862{
2863 if( targets.empty() ) {
2864 // Nothing to cycle
2865 return;
2866 }
2867
2868 if( dst_critter ) {
2869 auto t = std::find( targets.begin(), targets.end(), dst_critter );
2870 size_t new_target = 0;
2871 if( t != targets.end() ) {
2872 size_t idx = std::distance( targets.begin(), t );
2873 new_target = ( idx + targets.size() + direction ) % targets.size();
2874 set_cursor_pos( targets[new_target]->pos() );
2875 return;
2876 }
2877 }
2878
2879 // There is either no creature under the cursor or the player can't see it.
2880 // Use the closest/farthest target in this case
2881 if( direction == 1 ) {
2882 set_cursor_pos( targets.front()->pos() );
2883 } else {
2884 set_cursor_pos( targets.back()->pos() );
2885 }
2886}
2887
2888void target_ui::set_view_offset( const tripoint &new_offset )
2889{
2890 tripoint new_( new_offset.xy(), clamp( new_offset.z, -fov_3d_z_range, fov_3d_z_range ) );
2891 new_.z = clamp( new_.z + src.z, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) - src.z;
2892
2893 bool changed_z = you->view_offset.z != new_.z;
2894 you->view_offset = new_;
2895 if( changed_z ) {
2896 // We need to do a bunch of cache updates since we're
2897 // looking at a different z-level.
2898 get_map().invalidate_map_cache( new_.z );
2899 }
2900}
2901
2902void target_ui::update_turrets_in_range()
2903{
2904 turrets_in_range.clear();
2905 for( vehicle_part *t : *vturrets ) {
2906 turret_data td = veh->turret_query( *t );
2907 if( td.in_range( dst ) ) {
2908 tripoint src = veh->global_part_pos3( *t );
2909 turrets_in_range.push_back( { t, line_to( src, dst ) } );
2910 }
2911 }
2912}
2913
2914void target_ui::recalc_aim_turning_penalty()
2915{
2916 if( status != Status::Good ) {
2917 // We don't care about invalid situations
2918 predicted_recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2919 return;
2920 }
2921
2922 double curr_recoil = you->recoil;
2923 tripoint curr_recoil_pos;
2924 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> ptr_lock = you->last_target.lock();
2925 const Creature *lt_ptr = ptr_lock.get();
2926 if( lt_ptr ) {
2927 curr_recoil_pos = lt_ptr->pos();
2928 } else if( you->last_target_pos ) {
2929 curr_recoil_pos = get_map().getlocal( *you->last_target_pos );
2930 } else {
2931 curr_recoil_pos = src;
2932 }
2933
2934 if( curr_recoil_pos == dst ) {
2935 // We're aiming at that point right now, no penalty
2936 predicted_recoil = curr_recoil;
2937 } else if( curr_recoil_pos == src ) {
2938 // The player wasn't aiming anywhere, max it out
2939 predicted_recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2940 } else {
2941 // Raise it proportionally to how much
2942 // the player has to turn from previous aiming point
2943 const double recoil_per_degree = MAX_RECOIL / 180.0;
2944 const units::angle angle_curr = coord_to_angle( src, curr_recoil_pos );
2945 const units::angle angle_desired = coord_to_angle( src, dst );
2946 const units::angle phi = normalize( angle_curr - angle_desired );
2947 const units::angle angle = std::min( phi, 360.0_degrees - phi );
2948 predicted_recoil =
2949 std::min( MAX_RECOIL, curr_recoil + to_degrees( angle ) * recoil_per_degree );
2950 }
2951}
2952
2953void target_ui::apply_aim_turning_penalty()
2954{
2955 you->recoil = predicted_recoil;
2956}
2957
2958void target_ui::action_switch_mode()
2959{
2960 uilist menu;
2961 menu.settext( _( "Select preferences" ) );
2962
2963 std::vector<std::function<void()>> on_select;
2964
2965 if( !aim_types.empty() ) {
2966 menu.addentry( -1, false, 0, " " + std::string( _( "Default aiming mode" ) ) );
2967 menu.entries.back().force_color = true;
2968 menu.entries.back().text_color = c_cyan;
2969
2970 for( auto it = aim_types.begin(); it != aim_types.end(); ++it ) {
2971 const bool is_active_aim_mode = aim_mode == it;
2972 const std::string text = ( it->name.empty() ? _( "Immediate" ) : it->name ) +
2973 ( is_active_aim_mode ? _( " (active)" ) : "" );
2974
2975 menu.addentry( on_select.size(), true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, text );
2976 on_select.emplace_back( [it, this]() {
2977 aim_mode = it;
2978 you->preferred_aiming_mode = it->action;
2979 } );
2980 if( is_active_aim_mode ) {
2981 menu.entries.back().text_color = c_light_green;
2982 }
2983 }
2984 }
2985
2986 const std::map<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &all_gun_modes = relevant->gun_all_modes();
2987 if( !all_gun_modes.empty() ) {
2988 menu.addentry( -1, false, 0, " " + std::string( _( "Firing mode" ) ) );
2989 menu.entries.back().force_color = true;
2990 menu.entries.back().text_color = c_cyan;
2991
2992 for( const auto &mode : all_gun_modes ) {
2993 if( mode.second.melee() ) {
2994 continue;
2995 }
2996 const bool active_gun_mode = relevant->gun_get_mode_id() == mode.first;
2997
2998 // If gun mode is from a gunmod use gunmod's name, pay attention to the "->" on tname
2999 std::string text = ( mode.second.target == relevant )
3000 ? mode.second.tname()
3001 : mode.second->tname() + " (" + std::to_string( mode.second.qty ) + ")";
3002
3003 text += ( active_gun_mode ? _( " (active)" ) : "" );
3004
3005 menu.entries.emplace_back( static_cast<int>( on_select.size() ), true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, text );
3006 on_select.emplace_back( [mode, this]() {
3007 relevant->gun_set_mode( mode.first );
3008 } );
3009 if( active_gun_mode ) {
3010 menu.entries.back().text_color = c_light_green;
3011 if( menu.selected == 0 ) {
3012 menu.selected = menu.entries.size() - 1;
3013 }
3014 }
3015 }
3016 }
3017
3018 menu.query();
3019 if( menu.ret >= 0 && menu.ret < static_cast<int>( on_select.size() ) ) {
3020 size_t i = static_cast<size_t>( menu.ret );
3021 on_select[i]();
3022 } // else - just refresh
3023
3024 ensure_ranged_gun_mode();
3025 update_ammo_range_from_gun_mode();
3026 on_range_ammo_changed();
3027}
3028
3029void target_ui::ensure_ranged_gun_mode()
3030{
3031 while( relevant->gun_current_mode().melee() ) {
3032 relevant->gun_cycle_mode();
3033 }
3034}
3035
3036void target_ui::update_ammo_range_from_gun_mode()
3037{
3038 if( mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
3039 itype_id ammo_current = turret->ammo_current();
3040 // Test no-ammo and not a UPS weapon
3041 if( !ammo_current && ( relevant->get_gun_ups_drain() == 0 ) ) {
3042 ammo = nullptr;
3043 range = 0;
3044 } else {
3045 ammo = &*ammo_current;
3046 range = turret->range();
3047 }
3048 } else {
3049 ammo = relevant->gun_current_mode().target->ammo_data();
3050 range = relevant->gun_current_mode().target->gun_range( you );
3051 }
3052}
3053
3054bool target_ui::action_switch_ammo()
3055{
3056 if( mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
3057 // For turrets that use vehicle tanks & can fire multiple liquids
3058 if( turret->ammo_options().size() > 1 ) {
3059 const auto opts = turret->ammo_options();
3060 auto iter = opts.find( turret->ammo_current() );
3061 turret->ammo_select( ++iter != opts.end() ? *iter : *opts.begin() );
3062 ammo = &*turret->ammo_current();
3063 range = turret->range();
3064 }
3065 } else {
3066 // Leave aiming UI and open reloading UI since
3067 // reloading annihilates our aim anyway
3068 return false;
3069 }
3070 on_range_ammo_changed();
3071 return true;
3072}
3073
3074bool target_ui::action_aim()
3075{
3076 set_last_target();
3077 apply_aim_turning_penalty();
3078 const double min_recoil = calculate_aim_cap( *you, dst );
3079 for( int i = 0; i < 10; ++i ) {
3080 do_aim( *you, *relevant, min_recoil );
3081 }
3082
3083 // We've changed pc.recoil, update penalty
3084 recalc_aim_turning_penalty();
3085
3086 return you->moves > 0;
3087}
3088
3089bool target_ui::action_aim_and_shoot( const std::string &action )
3090{
3091 std::vector<aim_type>::iterator it;
3092 for( it = aim_types.begin(); it != aim_types.end(); it++ ) {
3093 if( action == it->action ) {
3094 break;
3095 }
3096 }
3097 if( it == aim_types.end() ) {
3098 debugmsg( "Could not find a valid aim_type for %s", action.c_str() );
3099 aim_mode = aim_types.begin();
3100 }
3101 int aim_threshold = it->threshold;
3102 set_last_target();
3103 apply_aim_turning_penalty();
3104 const double min_recoil = calculate_aim_cap( *you, dst );
3105 do {
3106 do_aim( *you, relevant ? *relevant : null_item_reference(), min_recoil );
3107 } while( you->moves > 0 && you->recoil > aim_threshold &&
3108 you->recoil - sight_dispersion > min_recoil );
3109
3110 // If we made it under the aim threshold, go ahead and fire.
3111 // Also fire if we're at our best aim level already.
3112 // If no critter is at dst then sight dispersion does not apply,
3113 // so it would lock into an infinite loop.
3114 bool done_aiming = you->recoil <= aim_threshold || you->recoil - sight_dispersion == min_recoil ||
3115 ( !g->critter_at( dst ) && you->recoil == min_recoil );
3116 return done_aiming;
3117}
3118
3119void target_ui::draw_terrain_overlay()
3120{
3121 tripoint center = you->pos() + you->view_offset;
3122
3123 // Removes parts that don't belong to currently visible Z level
3124 const auto filter_this_z = [&center]( const std::vector<tripoint> &traj ) {
3125 std::vector<tripoint> this_z = traj;
3126 this_z.erase( std::remove_if( this_z.begin(), this_z.end(),
3127 [&center]( const tripoint & p ) {
3128 return p.z != center.z;
3129 } ), this_z.end() );
3130 return this_z;
3131 };
3132
3133 // FIXME: TILES version of g->draw_line helpfully draws a cursor at last point.
3134 // This creates a fake cursor if 'dst' is on a z-level we cannot see.
3135
3136 // Draw approximate line of fire for each turret in range
3137 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets && draw_turret_lines ) {
3138 // TODO: TILES version doesn't know how to draw more than 1 line at a time.
3139 // We merge all lines together and draw them as a big malformed one
3140 std::set<tripoint> points;
3141 for( const turret_with_lof &it : turrets_in_range ) {
3142 std::vector<tripoint> this_z = filter_this_z( it.line );
3143 for( const tripoint &p : this_z ) {
3144 points.insert( p );
3145 }
3146 }
3147 // Since "trajectory" for each turret is just a straight line,
3148 // we can draw it even if the player can't see some parts
3149 points.erase( dst ); // Workaround for fake cursor on TILES
3150 std::vector<tripoint> l( points.begin(), points.end() );
3151 if( dst.z == center.z ) {
3152 // Workaround for fake cursor bug on TILES
3153 l.push_back( dst );
3154 }
3155 g->draw_line( src, center, l, true );
3156 }
3157
3158 // Draw trajectory
3159 if( mode != TargetMode::Turrets && dst != src ) {
3160 std::vector<tripoint> this_z = filter_this_z( traj );
3161
3162 // Draw a highlighted trajectory only if we can see the endpoint.
3163 // Provides feedback to the player, but avoids leaking information
3164 // about tiles they can't see.
3165 g->draw_line( dst, center, this_z );
3166 }
3167
3168 // Since draw_line does nothing if destination is not visible,
3169 // cursor also disappears. Draw it explicitly.
3170 if( dst.z == center.z ) {
3171 g->draw_cursor( dst );
3172 }
3173
3174 // Draw spell AOE
3175 if( mode == TargetMode::Spell ) {
3176 drawsq_params params = drawsq_params().highlight( true ).center( center );
3177 for( const tripoint &tile : spell_aoe ) {
3178 if( tile.z != center.z ) {
3179 continue;
3180 }
3181#ifdef TILES
3182 if( use_tiles ) {
3183 g->draw_highlight( tile );
3184 } else {
3185#endif
3186 get_map().drawsq( g->w_terrain, tile, params );
3187#ifdef TILES
3188 }
3189#endif
3190 }
3191 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Shape ) {
3192 drawsq_params params = drawsq_params().highlight( true ).center( center );
3193 for( const std::pair<const tripoint, double> &pr : shape_coverage ) {
3194 const tripoint &tile = pr.first;
3195#ifdef TILES
3196 if( use_tiles ) {
3197 g->draw_highlight( tile );
3198 } else {
3199#endif
3200 get_map().drawsq( g->w_terrain, tile, params );
3201 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( tile );
3202 if( critter != nullptr ) {
3203 g->draw_critter_highlighted( *critter, center );
3204 }
3205#ifdef TILES
3206 }
3207#endif
3208 }
3209 }
3210}

3212void target_ui::draw_ui_window()
3213{
3214 // Clear target window and make it non-transparent.
3215 int width = getmaxx( w_target );
3216 int height = getmaxy( w_target );
3217 for( int y = 0; y < height; y++ ) {
3218 for( int x = 0; x < width; x++ ) {
3219 mvwputch( w_target, point( x, y ), c_white, ' ' );
3220 }
3221 }
3222
3223 draw_border( w_target );
3224 draw_window_title();
3225 draw_help_notice();
3226
3227 int text_y = 1; // Skip top border
3228
3229 panel_cursor_info( text_y );
3230 text_y += compact ? 0 : 1;
3231
3232 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire || mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
3233 panel_gun_info( text_y );
3234 panel_recoil( text_y );
3235 text_y += compact ? 0 : 1;
3236 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Spell ) {
3237 panel_spell_info( text_y );
3238 text_y += compact ? 0 : 1;
3239 }
3240
3241 bool fill_with_blank_if_no_target = !tiny;
3242 panel_target_info( text_y, fill_with_blank_if_no_target );
3243 text_y += compact ? 0 : 1;
3244
3245 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets ) {
3246 panel_turret_list( text_y );
3247 } else if( status == Status::Good ) {
3248 // TODO: these are old, consider refactoring
3249 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
3250 panel_fire_mode_aim( text_y );
3251 } else if( mode == TargetMode::Throw || mode == TargetMode::ThrowBlind ) {
3252 bool blind = ( mode == TargetMode::ThrowBlind );
3253 draw_throw_aim( *you, w_target, text_y, ctxt, *relevant, dst, blind );
3254 }
3255 }
3256
3257 if( !narrow ) {
3258 draw_controls_list( text_y );
3259 }
3260
3261 wnoutrefresh( w_target );
3262}

3312
3313void target_ui::draw_controls_list( int text_y )
3314{
3315 // Change UI colors for visual feedback
3316 // TODO: Colorize keys inside brackets to be consistent with other UI windows
3317 nc_color col_enabled = c_white;
3318 nc_color col_disabled = c_light_gray;
3319 nc_color col_move = ( status != Status::OutOfAmmo ? col_enabled : col_disabled );
3320 nc_color col_fire = ( status == Status::Good ? col_enabled : col_disabled );
3321
3322 // Get first key bound to given action OR ' ' if there are none.
3323 const auto bound_key = [this]( const std::string & s ) {
3324 const std::vector<char> keys = this->ctxt.keys_bound_to( s );
3325 return keys.empty() ? ' ' : keys.front();
3326 };
3327 const auto colored = [col_enabled]( nc_color color, const std::string & s ) {
3328 if( color == col_enabled ) {
3329 // col_enabled is the default one when printing
3330 return s;
3331 } else {
3332 return colorize( s, color );
3333 }
3334 };
3335
3336 struct line {
3337 size_t order; // Lines with highest 'order' are removed first
3338 std::string str;
3339 };
3340 std::vector<line> lines;
3341
3342 // Compile full list
3343 if( shifting_view ) {
3344 lines.push_back( { 8, colored( col_move, _( "Shift view with directional keys" ) ) } );
3345 } else {
3346 lines.push_back( { 8, colored( col_move, _( "Move cursor with directional keys" ) ) } );
3347 }
3348 if( is_mouse_enabled() ) {
3349 std::string move = _( "Mouse: LMB: Target, Wheel: Cycle," );
3350 std::string fire = _( "RMB: Fire" );
3351 lines.push_back( { 7, colored( col_move, move ) + " " + colored( col_fire, fire ) } );
3352 }
3353 {
3354 std::string cycle = string_format( _( "[%s] Cycle targets;" ), ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TARGET", 1 ) );
3355 std::string fire = string_format( _( "[%c] %s." ), bound_key( "FIRE" ), uitext_fire() );
3356 lines.push_back( { 0, colored( col_move, cycle ) + " " + colored( col_fire, fire ) } );
3357 }
3358 {
3359 std::string text = string_format( _( "[%c] target self; [%c] toggle snap-to-target" ),
3360 bound_key( "CENTER" ), bound_key( "TOGGLE_SNAP_TO_TARGET" ) );
3361 lines.push_back( { 3, colored( col_enabled, text ) } );
3362 }
3363 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire ) {
3364 std::string aim_and_fire;
3365 for( const auto &e : aim_types ) {
3366 if( e.has_threshold ) {
3367 aim_and_fire += string_format( "[%c] ", bound_key( e.action ) );
3368 }
3369 }
3370 aim_and_fire += _( "to aim and fire." );
3371
3372 std::string aim = string_format( _( "[%c] to steady your aim. (10 moves)" ),
3373 bound_key( "AIM" ) );
3374
3375 lines.push_back( { 2, colored( col_fire, aim ) } );
3376 lines.push_back( { 4, colored( col_fire, aim_and_fire ) } );
3377 }
3378 if( mode == TargetMode::Fire || mode == TargetMode::TurretManual ) {
3379 lines.push_back( { 5, colored( col_enabled, string_format( _( "[%c] to switch firing modes." ),
3380 bound_key( "SWITCH_MODE" ) ) ) } );
3381 lines.push_back( { 6, colored( col_enabled, string_format( _( "[%c] to switch ammo." ),
3382 bound_key( "SWITCH_AMMO" ) ) ) } );
3383 }
3384 if( mode == TargetMode::Turrets ) {
3385 const std::string label = draw_turret_lines
3386 ? _( "[%c] Hide lines of fire" )
3387 : _( "[%c] Show lines of fire" );
3388 lines.push_back( { 1, colored( col_enabled, string_format( label, bound_key( "TOGGLE_TURRET_LINES" ) ) ) } );
3389 }
3390
3391 // Shrink the list until it fits
3392 int height = getmaxy( w_target );
3393 int available_lines = height - text_y - 1; // 1 for bottom border
3394 if( available_lines <= 0 ) {
3395 return;
3396 }
3397 while( lines.size() > static_cast<size_t>( available_lines ) ) {
3398 lines.erase( std::max_element( lines.begin(), lines.end(), []( const line & l1, const line & l2 ) {
3399 return l1.order < l2.order;
3400 } ) );
3401 }
3402
3403 text_y = height - lines.size() - 1;
3404 for( const line &l : lines ) {
3405 nc_color col = col_enabled;
3406 print_colored_text( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), col, col, l.str );
3407 }
3408}

3410void target_ui::panel_cursor_info( int &text_y )
3411{
3412 std::string label_range;
3413 if( src == dst ) {
3414 label_range = string_format( "Range: %d", range );
3415 } else {
3416 label_range = string_format( "Range: %d/%d", dist_fn( dst ), range );
3417 }
3418 if( status == Status::OutOfRange && mode != TargetMode::Turrets ) {
3419 // Since each turret has its own range, highlighting cursor
3420 // range with red would be misleading
3421 label_range = colorize( label_range, c_red );
3422 }
3423
3424 std::vector<std::string> labels;
3425 labels.push_back( label_range );
3426 if( allow_zlevel_shift ) {
3427 labels.push_back( string_format( _( "Elevation: %d" ), dst.z - src.z ) );
3428 }
3429 labels.push_back( string_format( _( "Targets: %d" ), targets.size() ) );
3430
3431 nc_color col = c_light_gray;
3432 int width = getmaxx( w_target );
3433 int text_x = 1;
3434 for( const std::string &s : labels ) {
3435 int x_left = width - text_x - 1;
3436 int len = utf8_width( s, true );
3437 if( len > x_left ) {
3438 text_x = 1;
3439 text_y++;
3440 }
3441 print_colored_text( w_target, point( text_x, text_y ), col, col, s );
3442 text_x += len + 1; // 1 for space
3443 }
3444 text_y++;
3445}

3454 gunmod_name = m->tname() + " ";

3456 std::string str = string_format( _( "Firing mode: <color_cyan>%s%s (%d)</color>" ),
3457 gunmod_name, mode_name, m.qty

3466 colorize( ammo->nname( std::max( m->ammo_remaining(), 1 ) ), ammo->color ), m->ammo_remaining(),
3467 m->ammo_capacity() );

3474
3475void target_ui::panel_recoil( int &text_y )
3476{
3477 const int val = you->recoil_total();
3478 const int min_recoil = you->effective_dispersion( relevant->sight_dispersion() );
3479 const int recoil_range = MAX_RECOIL - min_recoil;
3480 std::string str;
3481 if( val >= min_recoil + ( recoil_range * 2 / 3 ) ) {
3482 str = pgettext( "amount of backward momentum", "<color_red>High</color>" );
3483 } else if( val >= min_recoil + ( recoil_range / 2 ) ) {
3484 str = pgettext( "amount of backward momentum", "<color_yellow>Medium</color>" );
3485 } else if( val >= min_recoil + ( recoil_range / 4 ) ) {
3486 str = pgettext( "amount of backward momentum", "<color_light_green>Low</color>" );
3487 } else {
3488 str = pgettext( "amount of backward momentum", "<color_cyan>None</color>" );
3489 }
3490 str = string_format( _( "Recoil: %s" ), str );
3491 nc_color clr = c_light_gray;
3492 print_colored_text( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), clr, clr, str );
3493}

3495void target_ui::panel_spell_info( int &text_y )
3496{
3497 nc_color clr = c_light_gray;
3498
3499 mvwprintz( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), c_light_green, _( "Casting: %s (Level %u)" ),
3500 casting->name(),
3501 casting->get_level() );
3502 if( !no_mana || casting->energy_source() == energy_type::none_energy ) {
3503 if( casting->energy_source() == energy_type::hp_energy ) {
3504 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2,
3505 clr,
3506 _( "Cost: %s %s" ), casting->energy_cost_string( *you ), casting->energy_string() );
3507 } else {
3508 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2,
3509 clr,
3510 _( "Cost: %s %s (Current: %s)" ), casting->energy_cost_string( *you ), casting->energy_string(),
3511 casting->energy_cur_string( *you ) );
3512 }
3513 }
3514
3515 std::string fail_str;
3516 if( no_fail ) {
3517 fail_str = colorize( _( "0.0 % Failure Chance" ), c_light_green );
3518 } else {
3519 fail_str = casting->colorized_fail_percent( *you );
3520 }
3521 print_colored_text( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), clr, clr, fail_str );
3522
3523 if( casting->aoe() > 0 ) {
3524 nc_color color = c_light_gray;
3525 const std::string fx = casting->effect();
3526 const std::string aoes = casting->aoe_string();
3527 if( fx == "projectile_attack" || fx == "target_attack" ||
3528 fx == "area_pull" || fx == "area_push" ||
3529 fx == "ter_transform" ) {
3530 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2, color,
3531 _( "Effective Spell Radius: %s%s" ), aoes,
3532 casting->in_aoe( src, dst ) ? colorize( _( " WARNING! IN RANGE" ), c_red ) : "" );
3533 } else if( fx == "cone_attack" ) {
3534 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2, color,
3535 _( "Cone Arc: %s degrees" ), aoes );
3536 } else if( fx == "line_attack" ) {
3537 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2, color,
3538 _( "Line width: %s" ), aoes );
3539 }
3540 }
3541
3542 mvwprintz( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), c_light_red, _( "Damage: %s" ),
3543 casting->damage_string() );
3544
3545 text_y += fold_and_print( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), getmaxx( w_target ) - 2, clr,
3546 casting->description() );
3547}
3548
3549void target_ui::panel_target_info( int &text_y, bool fill_with_blank_if_no_target )
3550{
3551 int max_lines = 4;
3552 if( dst_critter ) {
3553 if( you->sees( *dst_critter ) ) {
3554 // FIXME: print_info doesn't really care about line limit
3555 // and can always occupy up to 4 of them (or even more?).
3556 // To make things consistent, we ask it for 2 lines
3557 // and somewhat reliably get 4.
3558 int fix_for_print_info = max_lines - 2;
3559 dst_critter->print_info( w_target, text_y, fix_for_print_info, 1 );
3560 text_y += max_lines;
3561 } else {
3562 std::vector<std::string> buf;
3563 if( you->sees_with_infrared( *dst_critter ) ) {
3564 dst_critter->describe_infrared( buf );
3565 } else if( you->sees_with_specials( *dst_critter ) ) {
3566 dst_critter->describe_specials( buf );
3567 }
3568 for( size_t i = 0; i < static_cast<size_t>( max_lines ); i++, text_y++ ) {
3569 if( i >= buf.size() ) {
3570 continue;
3571 }
3572 mvwprintw( w_target, point( 1, text_y ), buf[i] );
3573 }
3574 }
3575 } else if( fill_with_blank_if_no_target ) {
3576 // Fill with blank lines to prevent other panels from jumping around
3577 // when the cursor moves.
3578 text_y += max_lines;
3579 // TODO: print info about tile?
3580 }
3581}
3582
3583void target_ui::panel_fire_mode_aim( int &text_y )
3584{
3585 // TODO: saving & restoring pc.recoil may actually be unnecessary
3586 double saved_pc_recoil = you->recoil;
3587 you->recoil = predicted_recoil;
3588
3589 double predicted_recoil = you->recoil;
3590 int predicted_delay = 0;
3591 if( aim_mode->has_threshold && aim_mode->threshold < you->recoil ) {
3592 do {
3593 const double aim_amount = you->aim_per_move( *relevant, predicted_recoil );
3594 if( aim_amount > 0 ) {
3595 predicted_delay++;
3596 predicted_recoil = std::max( predicted_recoil - aim_amount, 0.0 );
3597 }
3598 } while( predicted_recoil > aim_mode->threshold &&
3599 predicted_recoil - sight_dispersion > 0 );
3600 } else {
3601 predicted_recoil = you->recoil;
3602 }
3603
3604 const double target_size = dst_critter ? dst_critter->ranged_target_size() :
3605 occupied_tile_fraction( m_size::MS_MEDIUM );
3606
3607 text_y = print_aim( *you, w_target, text_y, ctxt, *relevant->gun_current_mode(),
3608 target_size, dst, predicted_recoil );
3609
3610 if( aim_mode->has_threshold ) {
3611 mvwprintw( w_target, point( 1, text_y++ ), _( "%s Delay: %i" ), aim_mode->name,
3612 predicted_delay );
3613 }
3614
3615 you->recoil = saved_pc_recoil;
3616}

3646
3647bool ranged::gunmode_checks_common( avatar &you, const map &m, std::vector<std::string> &messages,
3648 const gun_mode &gmode )
3649{
3650 bool result = true;
3651
3652 // Check that passed gun mode is valid and we are able to use it
3653 if( !( gmode && you.can_use( *gmode ) ) ) {
3654 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "You can't currently fire your %s." ),
3655 gmode->tname() ) );
3656 result = false;
3657 }
3658
3659 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( you.pos() );
3660 if( vp && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( you ) && ( gmode->is_two_handed( you ) ||
3661 gmode->has_flag( flag_FIRE_TWOHAND ) ) ) {
3662 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "You can't fire your %s while driving." ),
3663 gmode->tname() ) );
3664 result = false;
3665 }
3666
3667 if( gmode->has_flag( flag_FIRE_TWOHAND ) && ( !you.has_two_arms() ||
3668 you.worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HANDS ) ) ) {
3669 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "You need two free hands to fire your %s." ),
3670 gmode->tname() ) );
3671 result = false;
3672 }
3673
3674 if( ranged::get_str_draw_penalty( *gmode, you ) < 0.5f ) {
3675 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "You don't have enough strength to fire your %s." ),
3676 gmode->tname() ) );
3677 result = false;
3678 }
3679
3680 return result;
3681}
3682
3683bool ranged::gunmode_checks_weapon( avatar &you, const map &m, std::vector<std::string> &messages,
3684 const gun_mode &gmode )
3685{
3686 bool result = true;
3687
3688 if( !gmode->ammo_sufficient() && !gmode->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
3689 if( !gmode->ammo_remaining() ) {
3690 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "Your %s is empty!" ), gmode->tname() ) );
3691 } else {
3692 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "Your %s needs %i charges to fire!" ),
3693 gmode->tname(), gmode->ammo_required() ) );
3694 }
3695 result = false;
3696 }
3697
3698 if( gmode->get_gun_ups_drain() > 0 ) {
3699 const int ups_drain = gmode->get_gun_ups_drain();
3700 const int adv_ups_drain = std::max( 1, ups_drain * 3 / 5 );
3701 bool is_mech_weapon = false;
3702 if( you.is_mounted() ) {
3703 monster *mons = get_player_character().mounted_creature.get();
3704 if( !mons->type->mech_weapon.is_empty() ) {
3705 is_mech_weapon = true;
3706 }
3707 }
3708 if( !is_mech_weapon ) {
3709 if( !( you.has_charges( itype_UPS_off, ups_drain ) ||
3710 you.has_charges( itype_adv_UPS_off, adv_ups_drain ) ||
3711 ( you.has_active_bionic( bio_ups ) &&
3712 you.get_power_level() >= units::from_kilojoule( ups_drain ) ) ) ) {
3713 messages.push_back( string_format(
3714 _( "You need a UPS with at least %2$d charges or an advanced UPS with at least %3$d charges to fire the %1$s!" ),
3715 gmode->tname(), ups_drain, adv_ups_drain ) );
3716 result = false;
3717 }
3718 } else {
3719 if( !you.has_charges( itype_UPS, ups_drain ) ) {
3720 messages.push_back( string_format( _( "Your mech has an empty battery, its %s will not fire." ),
3721 gmode->tname() ) );
3722 result = false;
3723 }
3724 }
3725 }
3726
3727 if( gmode->has_flag( flag_MOUNTED_GUN ) ) {
3728 const bool v_mountable = static_cast<bool>( m.veh_at( you.pos() ).part_with_feature( "MOUNTABLE",
3729 true ) );
3730 bool t_mountable = m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( flag_MOUNTABLE, you.pos() );
3731 if( !t_mountable && !v_mountable && !( you.get_size() > MS_MEDIUM ) ) {
3732 messages.push_back( string_format(
3733 _( "You must stand near acceptable terrain or furniture to fire the %s. A table, a mound of dirt, a broken window, etc." ),
3734 gmode->tname() ) );
3735 result = false;
3736 }
3737 }
3738
3739 return result;
3740}
